about.part1: I am a software development enthusiast with a focus on problem-solving and creativity. Throughout my university career, online courses, and personal projects, I have developed solid skills in languages such as Java, C#, SQL, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS. As a freelancer, I specialize in delivering comprehensive solutions, from creating REST APIs and microservices on the backend to developing attractive and responsive interfaces on the frontend.
about.part2: My approach is not only centered on creating new functionalities but also on improving and refactoring existing code to adhere to industry best practices. Although I lack experience working in companies, my ability to learn quickly and my passion for programming enable me to tackle complex challenges with enthusiasm. In my spare time, I continue to learn new technologies and refine my skills to provide increasingly effective and creative solutions.

services.backend: Design and development of REST APIs, microservices, and server-side logic using best practices in architecture and security. Whether you need an API for your mobile application or a microservices system for your platform, I can help you build it efficiently and scalably.
services.frontend: Creation of modern, visually appealing user interfaces that enhance the user experience. I ensure that each project is optimized for various devices and browsers, providing a consistent and enjoyable experience.
services.database: Design, implementation, and management of relational and non-relational databases. I can optimize your queries' performance and ensure data integrity, using technologies such as SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB, and more.
services.refactor: Do you have legacy code or want to improve the quality of your current code? I can help you refactor and optimize your code following best practices, making your application more maintainable and efficient.
